data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Plateau, Benin. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Plateau, Benin
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Plateau, Benin to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, 435,600 people live in the state of Plateau. Please, give them 87 new simple churches this year.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 32,535 believers in Plateau, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Mandingo, Mandinka people. 0.3% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Plateau, Benin.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Plateau.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Plateau to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

location.name: Plateau
location.people_groups_list: Burusa, Bulba, Batonu, Baruba, Songhai-Koyraboro, Lukpa, Gbe, Seto
